import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { call, location, mail, globe, chevronBack, ellipsisVerticalOutline} from 'ionicons/icons' import { IonContent, IonHeader, IonPage, IonTitle, IonToolbar, IonCard, IonItem, IonCardContent, IonIcon, IonButtons, IonBackButton, IonButton, IonPopover } from '@ionic/react'; import {Contacts,Contact, ContactField, ContactName } from '@ionic-native/contacts'; import './Contact.css'; const ContactPg: React.FC = () => { const addContact = async () =>{ console.log('Add contact button clicked') var contact: Contact = contact.contacts.create(); contact.name = new ContactName('Frank', 'Allart'); contact.phoneNumber = new ContactField('mobile','0000'); contact.save().then( () => console.log('Contact saved!'), (error: any) => console.error('Error saving contact.', error) ); }; const [showPopover, setShowPopover] = useState(false); return ( Contact setShowPopover(true)}> setShowPopover(false)}> Notifications
Search
Rate Now
Share Now

UK Call

+44 121 410 6000

USA Call

+1888 582 9110

UK Email

sales@frankallart.co.uk

USA Email

Sales@frankallart.com

UK Address

15/35 Great Tindal Street,Birmingham,B16 8DR UK

USA Address

25 Sylvan Road South,Suite N,Westport,CT 06880 USA

Website

www.frankallart.co.uk

 ); }; export default ContactPg;
